message: They may have been almost human as we are, once… before, whatever was… done to them, now they are something… else…

name: xenoid bone
description: A bone generously 'donated' by a Xenoid, if it wasn't from an alien you might mistake it for something terrestrial.
//: Not for use in edible recipes, and should require ~200% as much as normal for applicable inedible recipes except for charcoal.

name: small xenoid bone
description: A small bone 'donated' by a very generous Xenoid.  It is a small oval, thin like a guitar pick, and with a small hole near one end.
//: Not for use in edible recipes, and should require ~200% as much as normal for applicable inedible recipes except for charcoal.
